results.name: Riordan array (1, x/(1-3*x+2*x^2)).
comment: Triangle T(n,k), read by rows, given by (0, 3, -2/3, 2/3, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, ...) DELTA (1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, ...) where DELTA is the operator defined in A084938.
Diagonals sums are even-indexed Fibonacci numbers.
formula: Sum_{k, 0<=k<=n} T(n,k)*x^k = A000007(n), A204089(n), A204091(n) for x = 0, 1, 2 respectively.
xref: Columns: A000007, A000225 (Mersenne numbers), A045618, A055582.
results.author: _Philippe Deléham_, Feb 06 2012
